text: Sydaphera spengleriana, the Spengler's nutmeg, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Distribution== This species is widespread from Indonesia to Japan.GBIF ==Description== Shell of Sydaphera spengleriana can reach a size of .
